summary: Retrieve a list of responsible persons in the EU languages supported by TikTok Shop based on their ID or keywords
description:
Retrieve a list of responsible persons in the EU languages supported by TikTok Shop based on their ID or keywords. When creating a product, pass the returned responsible_person_id to associate the product with the responsible person. Target seller: Local sellers operating in EU countries Version
202501
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.
The number of results to be returned per page.  Valid range: [1-100]
An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: Filter results by these responsible person IDs. Max IDs: The value of page_size

Filter results to show those that contain this keyword. Search scope: name, local_number, email Max length: 200 characters  Note: Provide either the responsible_person_ids or keyword; if both are provided, responsible_person_ids will take priority.
The BCP-47 locale codes for displaying the responsible person information. Default: The locale of the seller's registered business address. Possible values: - de-DE - en-IE - es-ES - fr-FR - it-IT

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: The list of responsible persons that meet the query conditions.
The responsible person ID in TikTok Shop.
A list of contact details for the responsible person, presented in different languages for each supported EU country.
The BCP-47 locale code representing the language used for specifying the responsible person information. Possible values: - de-DE - en-IE - es-ES - fr-FR - it-IT
The responsible person name. Max length: 200 characters
The email address of the responsible person.
The phone number of the responsible person.
The country code of the phone number, prefixed by a plus + symbol. E.g. +353 for Ireland. Only EU country codes are allowed. Max digits: 4
The residential address of the responsible person.
The detailed street address of the location, including the building number, street name, district, city, province, and any relevant details. Max length: 500 characters

(Deprecated: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to street_address_line1 instead for the relevant details.)  An optional secondary line for additional address details, if necessary. Max length: 500 characters
(Deprecated: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to street_address_line1 instead for the district name.)  The district name. Max length: 500 characters
(Deprecated: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to street_address_line1 instead for the city name.)  The city name. Max length: 500 characters
The postal code. Max length: 500 characters

(Deprecated: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to street_address_line1 instead for the province name.)  The province, state, or region name. Max length: 500 characters
The two letter ISO 3166 country code representing the country of the address. It must be an EU country.
The number of responsible persons that meet the query conditions.
An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the page_token parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

error_codes.message: The number of ids is larger than page size
Operation is not supported for global seller
